funding-source.named-content: National Natural Science Foundation of China

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by National Science and Technology Major Project (2018ZX09737-010), the National Natural Science Foundation of China (81730109), Programme for Outstanding Medical Academic Leader of Shanghai Municipality (LJ10005) and Three-Year Action Plan for Development of TCM in Shanghai (ZY3-CCCX-2-1003).
